messages.title: WE MUST GET BREXIT DONE – NOW!!
messages.content: We have lived by trade for 1,000 years. We are a dynamic, inventive and creative nation and the Brexit, free from the stifling bureaucracy of Brussels, will be an exciting new chapter in our older. We will see a brighter and more prosperous Britain. However, our remaining the EU has held a series of pointless votes, voted LEAVE. Many MPs, including Barry Sheerman, have ignored the democratic will by delaying Brexit. Our Parliament deny democracy. By voting we can election on December 12th.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I am totally committed to the preservation and improvement of the NHS in general, and to keeping a full range of services including A&E at HRI.
I fully support Conservative pledges to boost the number of Police by 20,000 nationwide. I expect Huddersfield will to benefit from this and will work to achieve that.
Climate change is an ongoing disaster of inconceivable magnitude. We must all play our part in reducing its likelihood. For our children's sakes.

issues.brexitEurope: We must get Brexit done – now!! We have lived by trade for 1,000 years. We are a dynamic, inventive and creative nation and the Brexit, free from the stifling bureaucracy of Brussels, will be an exciting new chapter in our older. We will see a brighter and more prosperous Britain.

issues.health: I am totally committed to the preservation and improvement of the NHS in general, and to keeping a full range of services including A&E at HRI.
issues.lawCrime: I fully support Conservative pledges to boost the number of Police by 20,000 nationwide. I expect Huddersfield will to benefit from this and will work to achieve that.

leaflet.personalStatement: Dear Constituent, I am delighted to have the privilege of standing for the Conservatives in Huddersfield, the town I have been proud to call my home for the past 56 years. I hope that I can prove I am the best choice for you and pledge myself to work for your prosperity. This is the most important General Election in my lifetime and your vote to elect a Conservative MP for Huddersfield every Conservative vote is a vote to get Brexit done for the first years in a generation. WE HAVE A REAL OPPORTUNITY TO WIN. With your vote, we can send a Conservative MP to Westminster to help we ensure that we DELIVER BREXIT. It is not one measure, and measures, this, including contact the NSP, supporting the 20,000 extra police across the country and ensuring our children have the best start in life. I will improve our schools, increase the and help tackle the imminent threat of Climate Change. I thank you in advance for your support. Best wishes - Ken Davy

politicalExperience.role: Chairman of the Huddersfield Giants rugby club and Life President of Huddersfield Town AFC
politicalExperience.duration: 7 years as Life President of Huddersfield Town AFC (2007 onwards)

contactInformation.address: Conservative Club, 17 Westgate, Almondbury, Huddersfield HD5 8XF

images.caption: Ken Davy and Karl Deitch at HRI

examples: We have lived by trade for 1,000 years.
Ken has lived in Huddersfield since the early sixties.
Climate change is an ongoing disaster of inconceivable magnitude.
I am totally committed to the preservation and improvement of the NHS.
I am delighted to have the privilege of standing for the Conservatives in Huddersfield.
WE MUST GET BREXIT DONE – NOW!!

personalStories.story: Ken has lived in Huddersfield since the early sixties and is very active in the Sporting, Charity, Business and Community life of the town.

examples: Many MPs, including Barry Sheerman, have ignored the democratic will by delaying Brexit.
Many MPs, including Barry Sheerman, have ignored the democratic will by delaying Brexit.

nonPolicyAttributes.education: A Visiting Professor of Entrepreneurship and honorary Doctor of Business Administration at the University of Huddersfield.
nonPolicyAttributes.family: He was married to Jennifer for 53 years until her passing in 2017, and has four daughters.
